titleStmt.title: Reasons metaphorphosis, and restauration Whereunto are annexed two other treatises. viz. 1. Choyce and applications. 2. My friend. By Charles Goldwell Master of Artes, and minister of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Goldwell, Charles.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] for Iohn Pyper,

notesStmt.note: "Choyce, and applications" has separate title page and pagination; "My friend" (caption title) has separate pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
